mapper.select: select * from survey_question order by sq_num

select sa.sa_num, sa.sq_num, sa.sa_item from SURVEY_QUESTION sq, SURVEY_ANSWER sa WHERE sq.sq_num=sa.sq_num
AND sa.sq_num=1 order by sa.sa_num
AND sa.sq_num=2 order by sa.sa_num
AND sa.sq_num=3 order by sa.sa_num
AND sa.sq_num=4 order by sa.sa_num
AND sa.sq_num=5 order by sa.sa_num
AND sa.sq_num=6 order by sa.sa_num
select count(p_num) from parcel WHERE p_num = #{p_num} AND receive Like 'Y'
select count(s_b.R_NUM) from survey_board s_b, recipient r, parcel p WHERE s_b.r_num=r.r_num AND r.p_num=p.p_num AND p.p_num = #{p_num}
select r.r_num,d.e_num,r.r_receiver from parcel p, deliverestimation d, recipient r where p.p_num=r.p_num and p.p_num=d.p_num AND p.p_num=#{p_num}
